quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to make an attempt to venture east. And then, pick-up the rectangular keycard from the floor of the kitchenette. After that, venture west. After that, doublecheck that the rectangular locker within the study is unlocked with the rectangular keycard. After unlocking the rectangular locker, open the rectangular locker. After pulling open the rectangular locker, pick up the type M passkey from the rectangular locker in the study. After you have got the type M passkey, attempt to venture east. Following that, unlock the type M safe. After you have unlocked the type M safe, make sure that the type M safe in the kitchenette is ajar. And then, deposit the butterfly into the type M safe within the kitchenette. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
commands: unlock rectangular locker with rectangular keycard
take type M passkey from rectangular locker
unlock type M safe with type M passkey
insert butterfly into type M safe

take type M passkey from rectangular locker
unlock type M safe with type M passkey
insert butterfly into type M safe

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchenette. A normal one.

 You can see a type M safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The type M safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The type M safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see a refrigerator.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a rack. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a rack? The rack is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the rack you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You see a chair. The chair is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the chair you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. [if there is something on the s_2]On the table you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Ah, the study. This is some kind of study, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You scan the room, seeing a rectangular locker. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The rectangular locker contains [a list of things in the c_1]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The rectangular locker is empty![end if] You can make out a stand. The stand is typical.[if there is something on the s_3] On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the mantelpiece.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a bookshelf. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The bookshelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the bookshelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a workshop.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

You've entered a closet. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a workbench. The workbench is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the workbench you can make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hopefully, this discovery doesn't ruin your TextWorld experience![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

walkthrough: unlock rectangular locker with rectangular keycard
take type M passkey from rectangular locker
unlock type M safe with type M passkey
insert butterfly into type M safe

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! First, it would be great if you could make an effort to move east. And then, retrieve the rectangular keycard from the floor of the kitchenette. Then, take a trip west. Following that, make it so that the rectangular locker is unlocked. Then, make sure that the rectangular locker inside the study is wide open. And then, pick up the type M passkey from the rectangular locker inside the study. And then, go to the east. Then, make it so that the type M safe within the kitchenette is unlocked. If you have unlocked the type M safe, ensure that the type M safe is open. After that, you can place the butterfly into the type M safe. Got that? Good!
